Package controllers

Class Controller_Tensorflow_ClassifyActionsPerTimestep

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.TensorflowLoader
      • controllers.Controller_Tensorflow_ClassifyActionsPerTimestep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController
    public class Controller_Tensorflow_ClassifyActionsPerTimestep
extends TensorflowLoader
implements IController
    Neural-network-based controller which uses a state to classify which key combination should be pressed. Only uses the current state and potentially the previous action to make decisions and is limited to the QP, WO, none/none key combinations.
    Author:
    matt

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      float actionLatchingThreshold
      Tries to smooth out noise by sticking with the current action if that action's predicted probability is above this threshold, even if another action has a higher probability.
      boolean verbose
      Print out each prediction.

    • Field Detail

      • verbose

        public boolean verbose
        Print out each prediction.

      • actionLatchingThreshold

        public float actionLatchingThreshold
        Tries to smooth out noise by sticking with the current action if that action's predicted probability is above this threshold, even if another action has a higher probability. 0 means stay with this action forever, 1 means immediately switch when a better action is predicted.

    • Constructor Detail
